channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The U.S. debt now equals $229,000 per household—and a hefty tax hike looms as the most probable outcome
item.description: Spiraling interest payments—which grew from $352 billion in 2021 to $970 billion in 2025—put the debt train on an accelerated track.

item.title: 1 Minute Late, 2 Hours Punished: This Attendance Policy Is a Legal and Cultural Disaster
item.description: Punctuality is important, but make sure you’re not breaking labor laws when you demand it of your employees.
